full_sentence: Women being of average intellect and highly agreeable fall victim more often to animalistic tendencies than men do. This is why whores can turn out innocent girls very easily with peer pressure. It takes legions of men to keep a woman honest and one other woman to make her dishonest.
a social market economy is the worst bullshit anyone can think of. Except for bisexuality, that's bigger bullshit
